msbt.message: I just heard about the new room. Congrats! You wouldn't happen to need a roommate, would you? Ha! Just kidding. Maybe. Anyway, I got you a little room-warming gift. It ain't much, but I think you'll dig it.
Another room, eh? Awesome! So what're you gonna do with it? Home theater? Art studio? Extra- huge laundry hamper? Whatever you do, I can't wait to see it. Let's hang out soon!
Your house is really getting huge! I got you this as soon as I heard about the new room. I figured with all that extra space, you might want some new clutter to cram in there. Enjoy!
Your place seriously has a lot of, um, place! Way to go! What're you gonna do with all that room? How about an indoor motorcycle track? I bet the stairs would make a wicked ramp! What do you think?
